General.Name: Vanfund Urban Investment & Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Vanfund Urban Investment and Development Co., Ltd. engages in business related to military and agricultural industry in China. The company also offers integrated circuits and modules for use in advanced radar, high-power semiconductor integrated circuits, aerospace, satellite communications, lasers, and other aerospace and military industries; and rice under the Chongmi brand. In addition, it is involved in the research and development, and production of vaccines; post-vaccination immune effect evaluation activities; real estate development; sales of agricultural and sideline products; provision of Leasing and business services; and grain processing and sales business. The company was formerly known as Vanfund Real Estate Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Vanfund Urban Investment and Development Co., Ltd. in April 2013. Vanfund Urban Investment and Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.
